Type Alias# RangeReplaceableBidirectionalSlice

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
typealias RangeReplaceableBidirectionalSlice<T> = Slice<T> where T : BidirectionalCollection, T : RangeReplaceableCollection
```
